Welcome in the movies library!
You can store here movies you want to watch.
Type movies name and press add button to add movie into the library.
If you saw the movie from library you can move it to movies seen frame simply by selecting it and pressing watched button.
You can not add the same movie twice.
Title can be maximum 28 chars long.
You can draw a random movie to watch by pressing random movie button.
You can delete any movie by selecting it and pressing delete button.
